reuters.title: PRICE <PCLB> TO BUY 80 PCT OF TSS-SEEDMAN
reuters.body: Price Co said it agreed to buy at least 81 pct of the stock of <TSS-Seedman's INc> for about 50 mln dlrs. The terms envision a purchase of the entire company, it said. The transaction is expected to close at the end of April. Reuter 
